# _Pod Save America_

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Jump to: navigation, search

![](//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/52/Merge-arrows.svg/50px-Merge-arrows.svg.png) |  It has been suggested that this article be [merged](/wiki/Wikipedia:Merging "Wikipedia:Merging") with _[Keepin' it 1600](/wiki/Keepin%27_it_1600 "Keepin' it 1600")_. ([Discuss](/wiki/Talk:Pod_Save_America "Talk:Pod Save America")) _Proposed since July 2017._  
---|---  
_Pod Save America_  
---  
[![Pod save america
logo.jpg](//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/6/6e/Pod_save_america_logo.jpg)](/wiki/File:Pod_save_america_logo.jpg)
"A no-bullshit conversation about politics."  
Presentation  
[Hosted by](/wiki/Presenter "Presenter") | [Jon Favreau](/wiki/Jon_Favreau_\(speechwriter\) "Jon Favreau \(speechwriter\)"), [Daniel Pfeiffer](/wiki/Daniel_Pfeiffer "Daniel Pfeiffer"), [Jon Lovett](/wiki/Jon_Lovett "Jon Lovett"), [Tommy Vietor](/wiki/Tommy_Vietor "Tommy Vietor")  
Format | Weekly political commentary  
Language | English  
Production  
Preceded by | [Keepin' it 1600](/wiki/Keepin%27_it_1600 "Keepin' it 1600")  
Publication  
Original release | January 2017 – present  
Provider | [Crooked Media](/wiki/Crooked_Media "Crooked Media")  
Related shows | [Pod Save the People](/wiki/Pod_Save_the_People "Pod Save the People"), [Lovett or Leave It](/wiki/Lovett_or_Leave_It "Lovett or Leave It")  
Website | [Pod Save America](https://getcrookedmedia.com/here-have-a-podcast-78ee56b5a323)  
  
**Pod Save America** is an American [progressive](/wiki/Progressivism
"Progressivism") [political podcast](/wiki/Political_podcast "Political
podcast"), co-hosted by [Jon Favreau](/wiki/Jon_Favreau_\(speechwriter\) "Jon
Favreau \(speechwriter\)"), [Tommy Vietor](/wiki/Tommy_Vietor "Tommy Vietor"),
[Jon Lovett](/wiki/Jon_Lovett "Jon Lovett"), and [Daniel
Pfeiffer](/wiki/Daniel_Pfeiffer "Daniel Pfeiffer").[1][2][3][4]

## Contents

[hide]

  * 1 History
  * 2 Content
  * 3 References
  * 4 External links

## History[[edit](/w/index.php?title=Pod_Save_America&action=edit&section=1
"Edit section: History")]

The podcast began in January 2017 as a successor to _[Keepin' it
1600](/wiki/Keepin%27_it_1600 "Keepin' it 1600")_, a political podcast which
ran from March to December 2016. It kept the same format with the same
hosts.[5] It is the flagship podcast of [Crooked Media](/wiki/Crooked_Media
"Crooked Media"), a progressive media company of which three of the four co-
hosts (Favreau, Vietor, and Lovett) are founders.[6]

In an interview with [Kara Swisher](/wiki/Kara_Swisher "Kara Swisher"), the
hosts have stated that rather than continue the previous podcast, the election
of [Donald Trump](/wiki/Donald_Trump "Donald Trump") as
[President](/wiki/President_of_the_United_States "President of the United
States") of the [United States](/wiki/United_States "United States") spurred
them to create a new, progressive media company with a network of podcasts.
Their goal is to inform, entertain, and inspire action or activism.[7]

The hosts went on their first tour in the fall of 2017.[8]

## Content[[edit](/w/index.php?title=Pod_Save_America&action=edit&section=2
"Edit section: Content")]

The podcast typically covers recent news items relating to politics
(specifically the Trump Administration, the U.S. Government, and the
Democratic Party), analyzing the possible outcomes and side effects of any
legislation or action to the American public. The show often features a guest
speaker involved in the show topic, usually an official or politician, either
active or retired. Their views run opposite of the Trump administration.
During podcasts, the hosts frequently inform listeners of varying ways to
resist or to take political action (such as showing up to town halls or to
consider running for local offices).[_[citation
needed](/wiki/Wikipedia:Citation_needed "Wikipedia:Citation needed")_]

## References[[edit](/w/index.php?title=Pod_Save_America&action=edit&section=3
"Edit section: References")]

[The Guardian](/wiki/The_Guardian "The Guardian").
  2. **Jump up ^** Rutenberg, Jim (2017-03-20). [ISSN](/wiki/International_Standard_Serial_Number "International Standard Serial Number") [0362-4331](//www.worldcat.org/issn/0362-4331). Retrieved 2017-03-22.
  3. **Jump up ^** Willis, Jay (2017-04-06). ["The Pod Save America Guys Have Some Ideas About What President Obama Should Do Next"](https://www.gq.com/story/pod-save-america-colbert). _GQ_. Retrieved 2017-06-11.
  4. **Jump up ^** ["CROOKED MEDIA FIGHTS TRUMP WITH "POD SAVE AMERICA""](http://www.newsweek.com/crooked-media-fights-trump-pod-save-america-jon-favreau-jon-lovett-tommy-570695). _Newsweek_. 2017-03-26. Retrieved 2017-06-11.
  5. **Jump up ^** Team, Crooked (January 9, 2017). ["Pod Save America"](https://getcrookedmedia.com/here-have-a-podcast-78ee56b5a323#.36hesbiwx). getcrookedmedia.com.

  8. **Jump up ^** ["Pod Tours America – Crooked Media"](https://getcrookedmedia.com/tour-a0ad61d0fee9). _Crooked Media_. 2017-08-15. Retrieved 2017-09-21.

qa.question: when do pod save america episodes come out

m.0br66_4.Query Analysis: The query asks about the release schedule of the podcast 'Pod Save America'. Specifically, it inquires when new episodes are released.
m.0br66_4.Query Keywords Extraction: Pod Save America, episodes, come out
m.0br66_4.Answer Analysis: The answer indicates that new episodes of 'Pod Save America' are released on a weekly basis.
m.0br66_4.Document Content Analysis: The document provides biographical information about Chaz Bono, including his background, gender transition, and career as an advocate, writer, and musician. It also mentions his parents, Sonny and Cher, and some of his media appearances and publications.

m.0br66_4.Document and Answer Keywords Matching: None of the keywords from the answer ('Weekly') are found in the document.
m.0br66_4.Key Information Matching: There is no key information in the document that matches the query or the answer. The document is entirely about Chaz Bono and does not mention anything related to podcasts or their release schedules.
m.0br66_4.Can the Document Answer the Query: No, the document does not contain any information about 'Pod Save America' or its episode release schedule.
m.0br66_4.Can the Document Help Infer Additional I: No, the document provides no context or additional information that could help infer the release schedule of 'Pod Save America'.
m.0br66_4.Explanation: The document is entirely unrelated to the query. It focuses on the biography of Chaz Bono and does not provide any information about podcasts, including 'Pod Save America'. Therefore, it cannot answer the query or help infer any relevant information.
